text:
Hi!

I’m Dev, based in London, I’m the founder of Sugar Wallet (Auto-investing app in 24k Gold with 200k+ users across India, Turkey, NZ) and now building our second product trying to optimise all the money flows in peoples lives (Income, expenses, savings) to give more money back in their pockets.

Came across Future of Coding via Lu.

I'm starting to learn to code to solve my own problems while I find a technical co-founder. My last business was a 3D scanning custom-tailoring shop back in New Zealand!

Passionate about Coffee, comfortable shoes and how we can make this world a more equal place.
